slides.notes: Welcome, everyone. Today, we dive into the fascinating world of Generative Artificial Intelligence, or Generative AI, a frontier that merges the boundaries of creativity and machine intelligence.

slides.title: Review of Last Week

slides.title: Agenda
slides.content:
What is Gen AI 
How Gen AI Works 
Examples of Gen AI 
Challenges and Ethical Considerations 
Conclusion 
Closing
slides.notes: Welcome, everyone. Today, we dive into the fascinating world of Generative Artificial Intelligence, or Generative AI, a frontier that merges the boundaries of creativity and machine intelligence.

slides.title: What is Generative AI?
slides.subtitle: The Creative Power of Machines
slides.content:
Generative AI is a subset of AI technologies capable of creating new content. 
This capability isn't limited to just images or text but extends to music, videos, and even code. 
Machines take inspiration from existing human-made works to produce new content.  
The content produced can sometimes be indistinguishable from human-created content.
slides.notes: Generative AI is a subset of AI technologies with the unique ability to create new content. This isn't limited to just images or text but extends to music, videos, and even code. It's where machines take inspiration from existing human-made works to produce something new and sometimes, indistinguishable from human-created content.

slides.title: How Generative AI Works
slides.subtitle: From Data to Creativity
slides.content:
Generative AI achieves content creation through complex algorithms known as machine learning models. 
These models fall particularly within the category of deep learning. 
They are trained on vast datasets to learn patterns, styles, and structures. 
This training enables the models to generate new content that mimics the characteristics of the training data.
slides.notes: But how does Generative AI achieve this? At its core are complex algorithms known as machine learning models, particularly those in the category of deep learning. These models are trained on vast datasets, learning patterns, styles, and structures. The training enables them to generate new content that mimics the characteristics of the training data.

slides.title: TRANSITION
slides.content: What are some examples of Generative AI?

slides.title: Examples of Generative AI
slides.subtitle: Innovation through AI Models
slides.content:
ChatGPT by OpenAI. 
Excels in human-like text. 
Useful for writing to coding.
slides.notes: One of the most well-known examples of Generative AI is GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer), developed by OpenAI. GPT models are particularly adept at understanding and generating human-like text, making them valuable for tasks ranging from writing articles to coding.

slides.title: DALL-E
slides.subtitle: Picturing AI's Imagination
slides.content:
DALL-E by OpenAI. 
Generates images from text. 
Translates language to visuals.
slides.notes: Another notable example is DALL-E, also by OpenAI, which generates images from textual descriptions. This showcases not just the ability to understand complex language but also to translate these understandings into visual representations.

slides.title: Challenges and Ethical Considerations
slides.subtitle: Navigating AI's Complex Landscape
slides.content:
Challenges and ethics in Generative AI. 
Issues with copyright and authenticity. 
Implications of AI content in society.
slides.notes: But Generative AI isn't without its challenges and ethical considerations. As we empower machines to create, we face questions about copyright, the authenticity of creation, and the implications of AI-generated content in our society.

slides.title: Discussion
slides.content:
What do you find the most exciting about gen AI? 
What are some potential challenges you see with gen AI? 
How do you think gen AI will impact the future of creativity? 
What are some ethical considerations we should keep in mind
slides.notes: Discuss these questions with the group.

slides.title: Activity
slides.subtitle: Jailbreak
slides.content:
Get into groups, open ChatGPT and try to get it to do something unethical. 
Report back in 5 minutes. 
We will discuss the results. 
Remember, this is a demo so there is no ChatGPT to open.
slides.notes: Don't actually do anything unethical, this is an excersise in trying to jailbreak the AI.

slides.title: Key Takeaways
slides.content:
Generative AI is a subset of AI technologies with the unique ability to create new content. 
Generative AI models are trained on vast datasets, learning patterns, styles, and structures. 
GPT and DALL-E are notable examples of Generative AI. 
Generative AI presents challenges and ethical considerations that we must navigate. 
Generative AI offers a glimpse into a future where AI can not only analyze and understand but also create, innovate, and inspire. 
It's crucial to navigate the ethical and practical challenges this technology presents, ensuring it serves to enhance human creativity and innovation rather than diminish it.
slides.notes: Today we discussed Generative AI, its capabilities, and its implications. We explored examples of Generative AI, such as GPT and DALL-E, and considered the challenges and ethical considerations that come with this technology. As we move forward, it's crucial to navigate the ethical and practical challenges this technology presents, ensuring it serves to enhance human creativity and innovation rather than diminish it.

slides.title: Conclusion
slides.subtitle: The Future of AI-Driven Creativity
slides.content: Generative AI marks a major advance in AI, promising a future of creation and inspiration, while highlighting the need to address its ethical and practical challenges to augment human creativity.
slides.notes: In conclusion, Generative AI represents a significant leap in the capabilities of artificial intelligence. It offers a glimpse into a future where AI can not only analyze and understand but also create, innovate, and inspire. As we move forward, it's crucial to navigate the ethical and practical challenges this technology presents, ensuring it serves to enhance human creativity and innovation rather than diminish it.

slides.title: Closing
slides.subtitle: Thank you for your attention
slides.content: I look forward to exploring this exciting field together.
